long_description:
The best start to the day is a good breakfast, especially when you have a full day of meetings or a jammed-packed vacation ahead of you in a city as epic as San Francisco. Luckily, SCH is harboring one of SF’s hidden breakfast gems in its breakfast buffet. Even better is that when you book our Bed & Breakfast Package, we treat you to those famous breakfasts. Here’s what you can expect:

 

For the length of your stay at Stanford Court Hotel, breakfast is on us. Join us each morning for a hearty (and convenient!) meal overlooking the San Francisco skyline. Start off with a strong cup of Equator coffee, a SF-born business that specializes in boutique roasts and sustainable practices, sourcing high-quality beans from the farmers themselves and developing lasting relationships with local businesses.

 

Have your Equator coffee, and a pastry, too. Fresh-baked daily, choose from flaky croissants and pain au chocolat, cinnamon rolls and brioche, as well fresh, seasonal fruit from local producers, as well as free-range omelets, and a plethora of breakfast meats, all part of our daily buffet at SCH.

 

Sound delicious? Then go ahead and book our Bed & Breakfast Package for the length of your stay in SF. A good vacation starts with a good breakfast.
